b075c1b1-aa92-4f4b-861b-fd99a2ea2f22.description: This certification validates the knowledge required of associate-level network professionals to understand BlueCat Integrity fundamentals, IPv4 address management, DHCP and DNS configuration, managing deployment, server administration, user access management and monitoring on BlueCat Address Manager and DNS/DHCP servers.
b075c1b1-aa92-4f4b-861b-fd99a2ea2f22.name: BlueCat Integrity Certified Associate

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the required BlueCat Integrity Essential Training program.
Score a passing grade of 80% or higher on the certification exam

f785ee20-8400-4198-9510-eac01bf04dd5.description: This certification validates the knowledge required of intermediate-level networking professionals to understand BlueCat Integrity fundamentals, IPv4 & IPv6 address management, DHCP and DNS advanced configuration, and high availabilty server management.
f785ee20-8400-4198-9510-eac01bf04dd5.name: BlueCat Integrity Fundamentals Certified Professional

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the Integrity Fundamentals Instructor-led training or the cumulative elearning requirements of BlueCat Integrity Essential Training; BlueCat DNS Professional and Integrity Fundamentals - Essential Training Path programs.
Score a passing grade of 70% or higher on the certification exam

9163407f-715f-438e-abea-0f7537399262.description: This badge validates that earners have foundational experience and ability to administer BlueCat Address Manager and the core network services provided by BlueCat DNS/DHCP servers. Earners are capable of deploying DNS and DHCP services, and have practical knowledge of DDNS, xHA, IP reconciliation, server management and user access permissions.
9163407f-715f-438e-abea-0f7537399262.name: BlueCat Integrity Fundamentals ILT Participant

badge_template_activities.title: Participated in 4 days of in-class presentations and instruction by an BlueCat Integrity expert.
Completed 37 hands-on lab activities in a virtual environment.

b239c8db-6adb-4b56-bd33-500d735b56d1.description: This badge validates that earners have foundational experience and ability to secure BlueCat Address Manager and BlueCat DNS/DHCP servers using IAM, DNSSEC, Response Policy Zones and BlueCat Threat Protection.
b239c8db-6adb-4b56-bd33-500d735b56d1.name: BlueCat Security & Advanced Configuration ILT Participant

badge_template_activities.title: Participated in 1 day of in-class presentations and instruction by an BlueCat Integrity expert.
Completed 6 advanced-level hands-on lab activities in a virtual environment.

2c4b401d-ea81-43b2-9a1a-13ea56c3f6df.description: This Badge validates the knowledge required of intermediate-level DNS professionals to configure and manage DNS architectures, multiple views and zones, Dynamic DNS, query logs and channels, and DNS Activity in BlueCat Integrity.
2c4b401d-ea81-43b2-9a1a-13ea56c3f6df.name: BlueCat DNS Certified Professional

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the Integrity Fundamentals Instructor-led training or the BlueCat DNS Professional elearning.
Score a passing grade of 80% or higher on the certification exam

d3f1246f-39c0-4115-b002-2be8b11a9ed4.description: This badge validates the knowledge required of associate-level networking professionals to understand DNS and Edge concepts, configure specialized DNS threat protection, Service Points, namespace forwarding and network policies. Earners have demonstrated comprehension of filtering and analyzing potentially threatening queries, managing domain lists, architecting specialized DNS query assessment and resolution pathways, and managing network policies.
d3f1246f-39c0-4115-b002-2be8b11a9ed4.name: DHCP 101

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the Edge Fundamentals training program.
Score a passing grade of 80% or higher on the certification exam.

6429dbd1-5967-420c-849f-94a6dcdb475f.description: This certification validates the knowledge required of advanced networking professionals to troubleshoot and manage BlueCat Integrity through demonstrated familiarity with the directory structure of BlueCat appliances; configuration files for DNS, DHCP, SNMP, and Anycast; deployment and notification operations; datarake diagnostics; and command line tools used to support BlueCat appliances.
6429dbd1-5967-420c-849f-94a6dcdb475f.name: BlueCat Support Provider Advanced Certified Professional

badge_template_activities.title: Prerequisites: BlueCat Integrity Essential Training DNS Professional Training Integrity Fundamentals Essential Training Path
Complete the Support Provider Fundamentals training path.
Score a passing grade of 70% or higher on the BlueCat Support Provider Certified Professional exam.

2f854113-c7ee-4c90-b2de-dcfc5f91589f.description: This certification validates the knowledge required of networking professionals to understand DNS security and advanced IP address management concepts, as well as practical techniques for securing BlueCat Address Manager and DNS queries including DNNSEC, response policies and threat protection.
2f854113-c7ee-4c90-b2de-dcfc5f91589f.name: BlueCat Advanced Certified Professional

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the Security and Advanced Configuration Instructor-led training or the cumulative elearning requirements of BlueCat Integrity Essential Training; BlueCat DNS Professional; Integrity Fundamentals - Essential Training Path and DNS Security in Integrity.
Score a passing grade of 70% or higher on the BlueCat Advanced Certified Professional exam

54863c53-c987-4d85-b87a-ef2733d9d381.description: This badge validates the knowledge required of associate-level networking professionals to understand DNS and Edge concepts, configure specialized DNS threat protection, Service Points, namespace forwarding and network policies. Earners have demonstrated comprehension of filtering and analyzing potentially threatening queries, managing domain lists, architecting specialized DNS query assessment and resolution pathways, and managing network policies.
54863c53-c987-4d85-b87a-ef2733d9d381.name: Edge Fundamentals

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the Edge Fundamentals training program.
Score a passing grade of 80% or higher on the certification exam.

0721131e-e56d-4cd1-847b-b12bbdf88c4d.description: This badge validates that earners have foundational experience and ability to administer Edge and configure DNS threat protection, service points, namespace forwarding and network policies. Earners are capable of filtering and analyzing potentially threatening queries, managing domain lists, architecting specialized query assessment and resolution pathways and creating network policies.
0721131e-e56d-4cd1-847b-b12bbdf88c4d.name: BlueCat DNS Edge Fundamentals ILT Participant

badge_template_activities.title: Participated in 2 days of in-class presentations and instruction by an BlueCat Integrity expert.
Completed 5 advanced-level hands-on lab activities in a virtual environment.

b17cd4a6-cc25-4fdf-a803-249edae2d0e9.description: This certification validates the knowledge required of advanced-level networking professionals to understand the process and methodologies involved in performing a DNS/DHCP/IPAM migration to BlueCat Integrity. This certifies that the recipient is eligible for participating in the BlueCat Migration Shadowing Program.
b17cd4a6-cc25-4fdf-a803-249edae2d0e9.name: BlueCat Migration Advanced Certified

badge_template_activities.title: Participated in 4 days of in-class presentations and instruction by an BlueCat Integrity expert.
Completed advanced-level hands-on lab activities in a private virtual environment.
Pass the BlueCat Migration Lab Assignment.
Pass the BlueCat Migration Fundamentals Certification Exam.

101203c6-997c-40ad-8f9c-044758793ce2.description: This badge validates that earners have foundational experience and ability to understand the process and methodologies in performing a DNS/DHCP/IPAM migration to BlueCat Integrity.
101203c6-997c-40ad-8f9c-044758793ce2.name: BlueCat Migration Fundamentals Participant

badge_template_activities.title: Participated in 4 days of in-class presentations and instruction by an BlueCat Integrity expert.
Completed advanced-level hands-on lab activities in a private virtual environment.

32043a25-c0a9-484f-bd9c-e0fff20739ad.description: This badge validates the knowledge required of associate-level networking professionals to understand the Gateway automation engine and BlueCat Adaptive Apps and Plugins. Earners have demonstrated comprehension of Gateway architecture, configuration, Docker, BlueCat APIs, scripting and sharing Gateway workflows, customizing Gateway and BlueCat integrations.
32043a25-c0a9-484f-bd9c-e0fff20739ad.name: Gateway Fundamentals

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the Gateway Fundamentals Instructor-led training program OR the elearning program.
Score a passing grade of 80% or higher on the certification exam.

3d376b03-eea3-4482-8f2c-a5df19ce4165.description: This badge validates the knowledge required of DDI networking professionals to understand and build BlueCat DNS and DHCP architectures in hybrid cloud environments. Earners have demonstrated comprehension of DDI considerations and best practices for migrating to cloud, Cloud Discovery and Visibility, and Hybrid DNS Update.
3d376b03-eea3-4482-8f2c-a5df19ce4165.name: BlueCat Hybrid Cloud Professional

badge_template_activities.title: Prerequisites: Complete the Gateway Fundamentals Instructor-led training program OR the elearning program.
Complete the BlueCat Hybrid Cloud Professional training path, including DDI for Hybrid Cloud, Cloud Discovery & Visibility, and Hybrid DNS Update.
Score a passing grade of 80% or higher on the BlueCat Hybrid Cloud Certified Professional exam.

80e27fc9-ca0c-4d28-87df-b71eb33958e5.description: This certification validates that the earner has been approved and certified by BlueCat experts to perform DHCP, IPAM and DNS Migrations to BlueCat Integrity.
80e27fc9-ca0c-4d28-87df-b71eb33958e5.name: BlueCat Migration Master Certified

badge_template_activities.title: Shadow a BlueCat Expert in performing a migration project.
Perform and execute a migration project under the guidance and supervision of a BlueCat Expert.
Independently perform and execute a migration project successfully, as evaluated by a BlueCat Expert.
